Fixed a conflict with #SmartVolumeMixer. For the latest changes always be sure to check: . 1. Added the ability to request for a gift, within the tweak's settings panel.
2. Added the ability to transfer you license from your old device to your new one or using your new device restoring the license from your old device.
3. Added full iOS12.x compatibility.
4. Redesigned most view styles. Small but noticeable changes.
5. Added 4 new view styles.
6. Added hud skin option (light, dark, darker, black).
7. Redesigned the settings panel.
8. Reduced the code and improved code logic.
9. Added compatibility with Neptune for iPhone.
10. Improved compatibility with SmartVolumeMixer.

Learn more at Midkin.net


- Added an option to replace HUD icons with percentage text.
- Upgraded including the new Purchasing System.
- Removed Youtube hook, since youtube app has fixed it's issue.
